website_summaries.verdict: If you need an affordable polishing kit for shoes and boots, this is an affordable option by a top name in shoe polish products.
pros: A top-selling polish kit by a popular brand
Inexpensive, easy to use and effective
Includes brush, clothes, daubers, and black and brown polishes
Comes with a convenient carrying case
cons: Some kits arrived with leaking polish containers
Brush bristles have the tendency to fall out after several uses

customer_reviews.title: Old and cracked up! Warning!
customer_reviews.text: The product must be very very old. The brown polish was all cracked up and hard to use. I needed it that day, or wouldn't have used it. The black is even worse than the brown! It's terrible dry and when you rub across the top it gives a white resudue. THEN I was at my local grocery store and saw the EXACT kit for several dollars less! I'm sure it was several years newer too! I worry this seller is peddling old products. This one has to be a decade or so to be that dry and cracked up, wouldn't it?
customer_reviews.author: Dede V.Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my own shoe polish instead of using my dads. liked it a lot. I wish there was an extra cloth for buffing each color and a wide brush simply because I like to have separate items for each color of polish, but for the price it's wonderful. The applicators worked surprisingly well. I had only ever used the horsehair ones, so I was sceptical, but I was pleasantly surprised. I've used kiwi shoe polish for 20 years. It's great, does the job, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bka

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it says... a shoe shine kit. Works exactly like a shoe shine kit. Looks exactly like a shoe shine kit. Once you use it, it smells exactly like a shoe shine kit... What is with the goofy questions about how this fits? It's a shoe shine kit, not a pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: rsinl

customer_reviews.title: Only came with black polish
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for the price and does exactly what it states. My order, like many before me, was missing the brown shoe polish and instead came with two black shoe polishes. It did come in a brown shoe polish container, but im glad I checked before using it as they placed the wrong shoe polish in it and would've caused a lot more problems.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: It says black and brown polish but it only came with black polish in a container labeled brown. Ruined my shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong description of the items in this kit. It clearly says black and brown polish but it came with black polish only. Even the container is labeled brown but it has black polish in it. I applied it to my brown shoes and completely ruined their color. Please do not deceive your customers like that.
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Will always trust Kiwi shoe polish!
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of Doc Martens shoes (one black, one brown) that I've had for ages! They were both in dire need of spiffing up, and I couldn't find my husband's shoe shine brush.... I think he was out of black polish anyway, and he hasn't had brown in years. So I decided to order a kit for myself. I polished and both pairs yesterday and they both look brand new!!! I'm so happy, now, to have all I need to keep my favorite shoes looking fabulous, all in one handy zip-pouch!
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader22

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe kit at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the brown paste but it took a tired old pair of dress shoes and gave them an extended life. Look almost as good as new now.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Dried out polish, nice kit and concept though.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe polish arrived completely dried out and cracked. Still somewhat usable and I like the kit itself - teaching my daughter to take care of our things and it’s a part of her Montessori homeschool education - one of her tasks she really likes and her favorite black leather boots need the love. I’ll have to replace the actual polish pretty soon though. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: ldeleon

customer_reviews.title: A bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit for only $13. I'm sure the brush is worth at the last that much. The black polish came with a crack down the middle, so I'm questioning the age of it, but the brown was fine. The polish came wrapped in a plastic, sandwich bag so I saved it for the sponge applicators. Everything fits neatly back in the pouch which I find really nice--now I don't have to look for all the pieces when polishing my boots. A bargain since I don't think I could have bought all of the parts separately.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Landry

customer_reviews.title: you'll need an extra brush and shine rag other than that you'll never go wrong with there brand I've used it for over fifty year
customer_reviews.text: well I've used this brand all my life, when I was in the military it's the brand they had at the PX , just remember this kit only comes with one brush you need two brushes one for the black and for the brown but to me its an old and trusted brand and i'll always stick with what I trust
customer_reviews.author: Sisto Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter or travel kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit that works well to start off a beginner or as an on the go set. Pros: 1.Both black and brown are included. 2. (2) application pads and microfiber cloths so colors won't mix. 3. Perfectly sized bag keeps other items safe from your shoe polish. Cons: None that I have found yet SUMMARY: Nice kit with the basics to get the job done. I don't really use the brush, but I don't find that to be a negative as I just throw a thick microfiber in the kit. That is just my preference though. Best buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little set. Perfect for what it is. Black and brown shoe polish and everything you need. Deducted points because one of the polishes was super dry and all cracked and the brush is just covering my shoes in bristles? It’s a little weird and bothers me, but it is affordable. It’s a good set I think I just got an old one of something?
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Not as full as before.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe polish has in the past been phenomenal. It’s what we always get for our nicer shoes. This time it was like the machine that fills the containers was off or something. It was not as full as it normally is. At least at the store you can look inside to check for fullness.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying colors
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with two "premium" polishes, one black and one brown. Don't use the brown on any lighter brown shoes, as it is impossible to blend. Also be careful of leaving it on the shoe too long before buffing it, as it may be hard to even out. Overall not too bad for such an inexpensive kit, but still not the best for any shoes you paid a decent amount of money for.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Most everything you need to keep your shoes looking sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: Most everything you need to keep your shoes looking sharp. Bag's big enough to add a can of mink oil and an old toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Keen

customer_reviews.title: Top Tier quality, and will pay for itself after a single usage, a Must-have for those who care about shoe care
customer_reviews.text: there are a ton of instructional videos online of proper polishing technique many of which recommend Kiwi and now I see why. Its truly amazing what this product did for my shoes, I have a pair of black oxfords that just shy of a decade old and after a treatment session with my kiwi polishing kit the consensus was they they looked less than a month old. This product plus a shoe tree means that with reasonable wear habits and treatment you shoes will last you a lifetime and look great every step of the way, I Highly Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: iScott

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is as described and comes with nice accessories. The reason it does not get a total of five stars is because the rag it comes with leaves behind small strings on the polished shoe. Otherwise, it shines the shoe nicely and covers up scratches and scuffs!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Singh

customer_reviews.title: You may not get the right colors!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe care kit cause I needed both colors black and brown. What do I get? 2 blacks. In this age of everything being made in god damn china I guess this is par for the course. I live out of the country so I ordered for delivery to my son who brought it with him when he visited me. So I cannot return it, hence the nasty review for incompetence. How black shoe polish was put into a tin labeled brown is beyond comprehension. I'd leave a 0 star rating if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact Shoe Care Kit
customer_reviews.text: If you only have a pair or two of shoes that still need to be polished, this kit will do the job. It's small enough to pack for travel but still has everything you need in a compact, see-through, zippered case.
customer_reviews.author: AnnH

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is extremely helpful - everything you need in one kit. You could probably get everything in the kit for a little less but this is just very convenient. I polished two pairs of shoes - one brown and one black - with this kit and make them look like new. I'm guessing the kit will last for many years - easily making it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: "irish141234"

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic value for the money. I shined 6 pairs of shoes of varying browns and blacks, and this did an amazing job of restoring the luster to them. The horsehair brush is a great addition and worked like a charm. Of course, using some pantyhose to put a final shining on your shoes is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Catalano

customer_reviews.title: great investment for leather
customer_reviews.text: Brought my black and brown leather shoes back to looking great. Comes with a really nice brush and buffer cloth. The paste is nice and thick and covered up scuff marks. Kit comes with 2 daubers that are easy to use. Very pleased with the results. Got a really great shine on the shoes and the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift - for my grandson My grandson is getting married and I bought this to help him keep his (& his wife’s) shoes the best. He was very happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little kit. Nice brush and good size polish. The rag sheds though. All in all I really like it and fits the bill for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Spatola

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend anyone to buy it, not because the product is bad, is just because you can get it cheaper at any retailer around your town, I did not check it before purchase it online my bad. but overall is a good product
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great to have handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself since my fiance' tells me that women never shine their shoes. I responded that my father taught me how and proceeded to show him. I ended up buying one for my son and for each of my grandsons. Well worth the inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This kit allowed me to bring back a nice pair of leather shoes I refused to let go of, because I’ve had them since the 8th grade. I’m 36 now! The brush and cloths are convenient. Easy to use and clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great starter shoe care kit
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small, portable shoe care kit and this works great. Did a fantastic job of refreshing both my black and brown leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not your dad's shine kit.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not high end though. The polish falls out of the cans so dont use it around carpet. I was military and remember the brushes and cloth being bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up! Not shiny
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover up making it look clear and all, but not that shiny new you may be looking for. Great kit, post brush and post towel to “shine it”
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Hollander

customer_reviews.title: Classic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Same great product. Looks like the original set that we are replacing, except creamier, and cleaner.... I think that one’s about 30 years old!
customer_reviews.author: Gr8OKcooks

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for some polish to clean up some pretty scuffed up shoes, but upon opening the box I knew immediately that this was poor quality stuff. I had thought KIWI was a name brand, but when I opened the box, the contents has leaked everywhere. Thank goodness they were in separate pouches. See pictures attached. I was forced to clean up the shine before I could try it on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Montez

customer_reviews.title: Blended perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned that the brown was too dark for my reddish brown leather boots but it blended in perfectly. The kit came with everything needed and I expect it’ll last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Sj

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit that restores the shine of your dress shoes
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a decent kit that you can use to shine your shoes pretty well. However, if this is your first kit there are a few things you need to know about. 1. The cloth used to buff the shoes is sad. It's very thin and not as big as it looks in the photo. 2. I find brush daubers to be much more easy to use than sponge applicators. It is harder to get wax into thin cracks with a sponge. If you want the horsehair daubers you will need to either buy them separately or get a kit that has the brushes included.
customer_reviews.author: Sufen Chang

customer_reviews.title: A Small Kit - Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a kid's shoe shine booth starter kit. Small tins of polish and one small brush, an applicator and a buffing rag. It does a good job cleaning and shining the leather though.
customer_reviews.author: John HuffTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: The kit and its contents were fine, except for the fact that both tins of ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit and its contents were fine, except for the fact that both tins of shoe polish were defective - one was covered in polish (perhaps because it had been filled improperly?) and the other had been dented and had a hole in its container. Everything seems to work pretty well, but it was a mess upon opening the package
customer_reviews.author: GCS

customer_reviews.title: Finally feel like an adult after reviving my dress shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finally feel like an adult after reviving my dress shoes. I was a first time user and I couldn't be happier with the result. Revived a pair of brown shoes. Haven't tried the black shine yet
customer_reviews.author: wn

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: People need to realize what they are getting with this kit. If you want a high end kit you need to spend an extra $50. This is a basic kit with entry level components. They easily get the job done for routine shoe maintenance. Most people have brown and black shoes so this is a good start. Guy: you look ridiculous walking around with chewed up shoes. If you throw away shoes for every time they get scuffed you're not very good with money. Start with this kit and learn the art of proper shoe care.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not like they used to make them
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Kiwi polish and I think the quality used to be better. Still, at this price it is fine and my shoes are now shiny. For best results I clean the shoes with a damp paper towel, then use the daube to thoroughly coat the shoes in wax. Then I leave them for 24-48 hours covered in wax and then use the brush (which is not stiff enough for my taste) to shine. After that I use the buffing cloth to add a little extra shine and consistency. Dampen it very slightly for a shinier look!
customer_reviews.author: John Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for anyone who is looking to start shining their own shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've never really had need to shine shoes before, but when I started wearing dress shoes everyday for work, I could see the damage that was being done to my good shoes. I bought this set simply because it was priced right and seemed to have all the necessary elements. There is a lot of bang for your buck with this package, and my shoes are still in excellent shape. I do wish that they came with instructions, as I had never shined shoes before, and there is certainly an art form to it. I had to consult a few youtube videos to figure out what I was doing with what.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: DId the job!
customer_reviews.text: My husband threw out out shoe polish kit a while ago and I needed to polish my black and brown Merrells. I used it yesterday and other than the typical shoe polish smell which always bothers me, the kit is fine. The polish went on easily and the brush supplied with the kit with some effort produced a good shine that lasted through bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: A very useful kit that comes complete to have great looking and shiny shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Orquidea

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter shoe shine kit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter set!! Good for a lot of touch ups! Bought for sons just married and another to replace my old kit and one more for son who started first big job after graduating.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Only came with brown
customer_reviews.text: Kit was supposed to come with 1 black and 1 brown paste. Came with 2 brown only. Luckily the shoes I needed to polish are brown, but still. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: AngryNuke

customer_reviews.title: What you need to get started to shine your shoes
customer_reviews.text: Its small, convenient, has what you need to get started with shining your shoes. This is my first kit and it had what I needed to get the job done. For a first timer this is a great kit. I'm sure there are nicer ones out there, but this gets the job done efficiently. Used the brown on my reddish brown shoes and the results were awesome, I'll be an avid shoe shiner for life now. Not five stars because there's nothing to put the daubers in. to keep the rest of the kit clean. I just used a small ziplock bag to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: devsherrard

customer_reviews.title: It’s a shoe polish that works
customer_reviews.text: I know there are other fancier brands, but Kiwi stuff works great and always have. Been loyal to the brand for a long time for a reason, it works. No need to spend extra money.
customer_reviews.author: DL213

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit for the price. I would give it five stars, but I knocked one off because the case it comes in is pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L Gold

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE SHOE SHINE KIT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS KIT WORKED AS DESCRIBED. IT REALLY GIVES A NICE SHINE TO MY FOOTWEAR. THE KIT INCLUDES EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO TOTALLY COMPLETE A SUPERB SHINE JOB. I WOULD RECOMMEND TO ALL.
customer_reviews.author: VITO D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size travel case size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size travel case size. The brush is a little on the cheap side. The first use of brush and I was losing several bristles. Not sure if that is just a break in or it will be losing that amount every time. Other then that, the rag, the polish and applicator were all as expected.
customer_reviews.author: trol1374

customer_reviews.title: This was great for reviving my shoes before putting them away for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great for reviving my shoes before putting them away for spring. The brown and black goes in very easily to leather and dealt with small discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna McQuillen

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Came with two brown polishing pasted instead of one black and one brown. Didn’t need the brown paste so pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: AZGirl

customer_reviews.title: the product is great. Size and case is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what they mean by the above category - "Fit as expected"- strange. However, the product is great. Size and case is perfect, and it's KIWI, after all. They are the KING of polish that I've been using for over 63 years!
customer_reviews.author: Don Easton

customer_reviews.title: He liked the fact that it all fit in a zipped ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He liked the fact that it all fit in a zipped bag. The product is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the containers was broken. I used the other one and decided not to send it back as it is too cumbersome. Perhaps, it was a mishap during shipping. I am an Amazon customer for a long time and they do a good job but mistakes do happen. Quality appears okay.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: My boots were scuffed scraped scratched and dry. After using this they looked brand new. Highly recommended,!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a damaged carry tote—torn very badly across the back. Tried to return it but the system won’t allow it—says it can’t be returned because it “contains flammable liquids or gasses.” Very disappointed they would even send something damaged like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great, it has everything I need to keep my work shoes looking great! My dad used the same Kiwi polish tins, but I was nervous to follow suit because of the time involved with waxing and buffing the shoes. I tried the liquid sponge applicators and they work, but can actually be far more messy. After using the wax/brush/buffing cloth kit, I'm sold. Takes a little more time, but well worth it in my opinion. The only issue is that the smell of the wax gives my wife a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Shine Kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at a great price. I highly recommend this shoe shine kit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sottnik

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy, not terribly high-quality, but a good practical solution
customer_reviews.text: I expected to get a pretty cheap shoeshine kit when this arrived. That's pretty much what it is, but it's not as bad as some other reviewers have made it out to be. Brushes are relatively durable, and don't week bristles every single time. At least, I have not had a problem with this. This kit was a practical solution for someone who only occasionally needs to shine up a pair of leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: sparkster14

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact shoe shine kit
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this particular shoe shine kit and received it shortly there after, I was pleasantly surprised . It came in a small reusable compact packaging than I had not expected . This shine kit does not take up lots of space and it comes complete with Brush and Rag, Black and Brown polish with two applicator for the black and brown polish.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Compact and easy to use. I keep it in my desk at work for touching up the scuff marks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Good little Kiwi kit for the money, I think. I'm sure it will last a long time. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dalauris Kolkman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoeshine kit
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this same kit for years. It has everything you need for black and brown shoes. It is the nicest polish I’ve used. For the price you can’t find a better complete polish kit.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyintheD

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why all these kits come with these sub ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why all these kits come with these sub par sponges as applicators... Can you just include a brush?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Kiwi!
customer_reviews.text: Good, but put a stronger bigger cloth. Or a little piece of paper that says “ if you want more or bigger cloths, here is the site” Or
customer_reviews.author: San Fran

customer_reviews.title: Does not include brown polish
customer_reviews.text: Overall this kit is good. The reason for 4 vs 5 stars is that the description is inaccurate. This kit does not come with brown polish. It comes with 2 tins of black polish.
customer_reviews.author: lane Strandberg

customer_reviews.title: A fine, basic shoe care kit
customer_reviews.text: I like this Kiwi kit because it has all the basic pieces I wanted to 'get started' with proper shoe care. The only thing it is missing in my opinion is some 'shoe-lotion'... a moisturizing lotion that both serves to nourish the leather and remove wax and polish build up before applying the final wax/polish. Really like the horsehair brush, it lets me buff a shine right into all the nooks and crannys
customer_reviews.author: W. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: NOT as advertised, description said one black, one brown tin of polish. Both are brown.
customer_reviews.author: James G Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for shining all kinds of shoes. I have used this multiple times on both black & brown shoes and the kiwi polish does great. It holds up quite well, even to the rain. Kit includes everything you need, and the pouch is small enough to pack everything in and store easily without having to cram everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Taran

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Helped restore my work boots and my non work boots. Great product with great results. In hindsight I should have bought the box to have something to set my shoe on. Because the Polish will get on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Hardwood guy

customer_reviews.title: Great complete kit.
customer_reviews.text: The set is complete and what I had expected. It works quiet well and my shoes look great. My only complaint was that there were no instructions on how to use it
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Birk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected. Arrived safely and works perfectly. ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Arrived safely and works perfectly. Now if I can just get someone else to polish my shoes for me.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: shoe polish leaked
customer_reviews.text: The brown can of polish had leaked. At least it was in a plastic bag, but the can is too messy and it will not wipe off so I have no choice but to throw it away. The horse brush seems ok. Haven't used the foam applicators yet. Overall it would have been a decent value for the price but now I will have to spend more money on a brown can of polish.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: As expected, black and brown polish, 2each of applicator and buffing cloth. Nice brush. Zippered case. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: holysmokes

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic kit
customer_reviews.text: If you just want to do some quick, basic cleanup, this is a good, inexpensive kit. The paste works well and the brush does a good job. I wish the sponges came in something that would keep them from getting polish on stuff - i just stick them back in the little ripping plastic bags they came in, not ideal. To do a complete job, you really need to finish with some edge/heel dressing, so just get this to complete your work!
customer_reviews.author: Ruprecht

customer_reviews.title: Does what its suppose to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give my black dress shoes a quick shine very now and again. After, using it once I think that the quality of the product could be slightly better. It seems that the sponges have no real spot to be placed once you dirty them up. Also, there are really no instructions on how to use all of the tools given to shine your shoes. But, it works as intended probably be better off just buying the items seperately.
customer_reviews.author: bus books

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little case. Not too big for a suitcase if I wanted to travel with it. The brush seems good quality and right size. Everything as advertised. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: CalFlyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Good basic shoe kit
customer_reviews.text: Good basic shoe kit. Amazon had me review as if they were shoes. I tried to do so, but they were extremely uncomfortable. I recommend that you use it as a shoeshine kit instead
customer_reviews.author: Seoulman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the finish onl electrolysis of old iron. Works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dean T.

customer_reviews.title: Been on the shelf so long the polish was caked
customer_reviews.text: Product should have been recycled long ago; polish so old it was caked
customer_reviews.author: John 805

customer_reviews.title: the polish kit is good. It has all the necessary tools needed for ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I had to answer questions on the "fit" of shoe polish but ... anyway, the polish kit is good. It has all the necessary tools needed for a good shine. No noticeable difference between Kiwi premium polish and the regular.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $5 on a kit with another brush and cloth
customer_reviews.text: Its an "OK" kit. If you already have partial kit, this serves as good replacement pieces. The brown die worked wonders on my shoes but the black was "lack luster" but definitely good for the price that I paid. It only comes with one brush and shine pad which was the reason it got three instead of four starts...since you can't mix the two it seemed like the kit was incomplete.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I feel pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blouse. Very comfy. I feel like a Spring Daffodil. LOL
customer_reviews.author: martha fazzini

customer_reviews.title: Nice complete set, but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with everything you need to polish your leather shoes. The horsehair brush is really nice and seems to be well made. But I mostly use the sponge applicators with the polish and unfortunately they are quite flimsy. The sponge came off the plastic handle quite quickly. Nothing a quick dab of "crazy" or "super" glue won't fix but this flimsiness seems to also apply to the metal containers the polish comes in as well. Opening them with the side tab is difficult and I'm not surprised that some people accidentally break the tab in the process. I find it best to open them very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Pinter

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - KIWI products are, always have been, and will continue to be - reliable and worth every penny. Been shining shoes with their goods since 1988 (US Air Force)....Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe kit. You put the polish on with the sponge & then you use the brush & it makes my boots shine. Such an easy no hassle process.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Stone

customer_reviews.title: Slit down the middle of the case
customer_reviews.text: The contents were all there, and perform as expected. The reason for the three star review is that the clear plastic on the case came with a slit down the middle. It is not a huge deal, but still pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Stauber

customer_reviews.title: Ok kit for the price, but received two black
customer_reviews.text: The description for this item states one black and one brown can of polish which is what I need. Unfortunately I found two cans of black polish in the kit. I don't think this is the fault of the seller since the card in the kit also lists 1 of each color. I assume it's a quality control issue with Kiwi when they packaged the item. I'm disappointed that I'll need to buy a separate can of brown polish.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It is a great starter pack to start shining shoes
customer_reviews.text: It is a great starter pack to start shining shoes. I like the polishes and the horsehair brush. The sponge applicators are okay. I did no light the cloth that came with it though. It leaves a lot of lint but I ended up using a old tshirt. I do recommend this for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Kim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to use and easily restored my shoes to like new.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Willford

customer_reviews.title: almost all you need
customer_reviews.text: I think you need two brushes - one for brown shoes and one for black. Maybe it's just me, but I don't want any black polish to find its way to my brown shoes. The brush and polish and daubers are high quality. The cloth was predictably useless. You will never see a shoe shine guy using a tiny little bit of chamois. I would pay more for a larger piece of chamois.
customer_reviews.author: Grego

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a travel kit...was looking for something larget.
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: Head of the class show shine
customer_reviews.text: Used on my black and brown shoes with outstanding results. Can’t go wrong with Kiwi!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good items, horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: A great deal and the kit comes with everything you need, but it comes in a flimsy, plastic case that’s cheap AF. The zipper didn’t work after I first unzipped it. Now I have a few items that roll around in the junk drawer separately.
customer_reviews.author: kevin Garner

customer_reviews.title: Good Polish - Needs better buffing cloth.
customer_reviews.text: Kiwi polish is still great quality. The applicators and brush work quite well and the case is good enough to keep things together. The only piece of the kit that is lacking is the polishing cloth which needs to be much bigger...and perhaps a little thicker. No way the cloth lasts as long as the polish in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Esq

customer_reviews.title: foam applicators are worthless
customer_reviews.text: The two foam applicators BOTH fell apart on their second use. The adhesive that finds the foam to the plastic is terrible. Other aspects of product work well.
customer_reviews.author: SBrookreson

customer_reviews.title: Good product otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Amazon wants to know how this product fit, i.e. too small, somewhat small, fit as expected etc. It was really hard to categorize in that regard. I tried fitting it in assorted places and can't come to any firm conclusions. Good product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description of the items in this kit
customer_reviews.text: Product is advertised as brown and black polish. But there was black polish in the container labeled brown.
customer_reviews.author: OB

customer_reviews.title: Great Decision
customer_reviews.text: When reviewing this item, it gives me the option as if these were shoes? Very weird. But other than that, this is exactly the product I was looking for and I love the fact it comes with black and brown. Awesome choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Miers

customer_reviews.title: kiwi shoe care kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit with bag that holds everything you need. At first glance, it looks small but the brush is the same size that I purchased a long time ago. I haven't tried it out yet cause I only recently bought some dress shoes that this is meant for.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

product_meta.title: Kiwi Select Shoe Care Kit
product_meta.description:
The KIWI Select Shoe Care comes complete with one 1 oz. tin of KIWI Select Premium Paste in black, one 1 oz. tin of KIWI Select Premium Paste in brown, 2 sponge daubers for easy application of shoe polish, 1 premium KIWI shoe shine brush with 100% horsehair bristles, and 1 soft and durable shine cloth for the final touch. In reusable convenient carry tote.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :6.8 x 4.1 x 3 inches; 8.78 Ounces
 * Item model number :DKK001
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :December 5, 2007
 * Manufacturer :ProActive
 * ASIN :B0010TP3AM

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #101,959 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #124 inShoe Care Kits & Sets 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars717 ratings The KIWI Select Shoe Care comes complete with one 1 oz. tin of KIWI Select Premium Paste in black, one 1 oz. tin of KIWI Select Premium Paste in brown, 2 sponge daubers for easy application of shoe polish, 1 premium KIWI shoe shine brush with 100% horsehair bristles, and 1 soft and durable shine cloth for the final touch. In reusable convenient carry tote.
feature_bullets: 2 Tins of Kiwi Select Premium Paste in black and brown
